benchmark_details.name: AGENT SECURITY BENCH (ASB)
benchmark_details.overview: Agent Security Bench (ASB) is a comprehensive framework designed to formalize, benchmark, and evaluate the attacks and defenses of LLM-based agents, covering various attack methods over multiple scenarios.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the security of LLM agents under various adversarial attacks and defenses.

data.source: Synthetic dataset generated for benchmarking various attack and defense scenarios.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the success of attacks and the agents' performance in various scenarios.
methodology.interpretation: Higher ASR indicates better effectiveness of an attack; higher PNA shows better performance under no attack scenarios.
methodology.validation: Robustness of agents is validated by testing across diverse attack scenarios.
